title: Kan Rendum Lyrics Poriyaalan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kan Rendum
Singer(s): G.V.Prakash Kumar, Saindhavi
Music: M.S.Jones
Movie: Poriyaalan

Kan rendum nee varaththaaney
kaaththu kidandhadhu
un vuzhi paadhai paarthu kidandhadhu
en anbae, vaa mubae.

Kaaththaadi polave en nenjamey
en kaigalil adhu thanjamey
indha naal adi indha naal
en idhayathil kadandhu varum.

Kan rendum nee varaththaaney
kaaththu kidandhadhu
un vuzhi paadhai paarthu kidandhadhu
en anbae, vaa mubae.

Aan manam veli kkaatti pesum
pen manam thirai moodi pesum
poovukkul irunkindra vaasam
kattrukku kadithangal veesum

Adi mouwnaththin mozhigale
kadhalin mugavari
manam indru ariginradhe

Edhu varai enai kootti povaai
adhu varai udan serndhu varuven
ulagaththai marandhodi povom
kanavil midhandhodi povom

Kan rendum nee varaththaaney
kaaththu kidandhadhu
un vuzhi paadhai paarthu kidandhadhu
en anbae, vaa mubae.

Kaaththaadi polave en nenjamey
en kaigalil adhu thanjamey
indha naal adi indha naal
en idhayathil kadandhu varum.
